body: This spelling makes me nervous, because a compiler that is smart enough can optimize this away (since divide by zero is UB, so anything goes). A better way is to read in an int from arg and divide by it.
body_html: This spelling makes me nervous, because a compiler that is smart enough can optimize this away (since divide by zero is UB, so anything goes). A better way is to read in an int from arg and divide by it.
